name: File To Link Bot
description: This bot will give permanent Download and Stream links for telegram files

APP_NAME.description: Copy Paste app name that you type it above

ARCHIVE_CHANNEL_ID.description: Create a new channel, post anything in the channel, forward the post to @message_ids_bot, now copy paste chat_forward in this field

Start_Message.description: The bot will send this message when user send /start
Start_Message.value: Hey Friends Your Are Owner Your Telegram Channel⚡Do you want to make money through the video you share? Here is a website for youHere's about our website± 1000 Views / 1$ (77rs)± Copyright Content Accepted ± 18+ Content Accepted± Unlimited Cloud Storage± Indian Website(Note : CPM will increase if used by a lot of people Upto 5/1000Views)Join Now Earn Money Though Share Your Telegram Videos Sign Up Now : https://jdisk.in/Just Forward Or Send Anything I Will Send Link And Shorten Link Inhttps://jdisk.in/member/dashboard

Session_String.description: [Optional] Pyrogram Session String, use session_generator.py to generate it, If you don't add it the bot will create a new session every Restarting.

Bot_Channel_UserName.description: [Optional] The UserName of any channel to force users to join it before using the bot, Make sure to make the bot admin in this channel
